summary: A conjuration follower who is also a vampire come comes equipped with a paralyzing daedric sword
descriptionHtml:
Winkleberg is a strange man growing up he loved to experiment with spells however some consequences of these experiments include Tamriels only case of self inflicted vampirism and an unwanted voice deepening, however a few good things came from Winklebergs experiments he became quite knowledgeable in the arts of conjuration an achievement that he still bears as a title despite being surpassed by many a wizard. He has now come to skyrim armed with his daedric sword in hand and obliviously wearing the robes of the mythic dawn hopes that he may once again start the legend of Winkleberg. 

Winkleberg can be found in the giant inn in riverwood
author: Britishgentleman
